[
EPIC Series Amplifiers
](https://audiocontrol.com/collections/epic-amplifiers)
The AudioControl EPIC Series Amplifiers deliver top-quality sound in a compact, thermally efficient design, all at an unbeatable price. Engineered with a high-current Class D design, ensuring maximum power output while maintaining efficiency.
![Altitude Series Amplifiers](https://audiocontrol.com/cdn/shop/collections/1.A600.4Altitude4-ChannelAmplifier600WRMSPNG.png?crop=center&height=2000&v=1760559378&width=2000)
###
[
Altitude Series Amplifiers
](https://audiocontrol.com/collections/altitude-amplifier-series)
When you’re seeking to elevate your audio experience with sleek sophistication, AudioControl’s Altitude Amplifier Series is your answer. Designed from the ground up, these amplifiers boast a modern minimalist aesthetic and superior heat dissipation, ensuring they not only perform at the top of their class but also look stunning while doing it. The Altitude Series is EV compliant.
![Matrix D-Series DSP Amplifiers](https://audiocontrol.com/cdn/shop/collections/1.D-5.1300High-Power5-ChannelDSPMatrixAmplifierwAccuBassPNG.png?crop=center&height=2000&v=1758723893&width=2000)
###
[
Matrix D-Series DSP Amplifiers
](https://audiocontrol.com/collections/matrix-dsp-amplifiers)
Award-winning amplification combined with the powerful DSP found in the DM-608 and DM-810 gives you the ultimate single product solution. AudioControl Matrix DSP Amplifiers feature OEM integration friendly features such as signal summing, AccuBASS® and the best sounding Class D amplification in the world, even if we do say so ourselves.
![LC Series Amplifiers](https://audiocontrol.com/cdn/shop/collections/1.LC-4.800High-Power4-ChannelDSPMatrixAmplifierwAccuBASSPNG.png?crop=center&height=2000&v=1758723913&width=2000)
###
[
LC Series Amplifiers
](https://audiocontrol.com/collections/lc-series-amplifiers)
With OEM integration friendly features such as signal summing and our patented AccuBASS®, AudioControl’s multi-channel and subwoofer amplifiers are changing the game in OEM integration, offering flexible and user friendly signal routing and control. Spend less time on the install and more time listening to music as it was meant to be heard.
![Monoblock Amplifiers](https://audiocontrol.com/cdn/shop/collections/1.EPIC2000MonoblockAmplifier2000WRMSPNG.png?crop=center&height=2000&v=1760021107&width=2000)
###
[
Monoblock Amplifiers
](https://audiocontrol.com/collections/monoblock-amplifiers)
AudioControl 1-channel amplifiers are designed to bring reliable power to your subwoofer systems.
![Multi-Channel Amplifiers](https://audiocontrol.com/cdn/shop/collections/EPICBIGFOUR_01.png?crop=center&height=2000&v=1760021131&width=2000)
###
[
Multi-Channel Amplifiers
](https://audiocontrol.com/collections/multi-channel-amplifiers)
Power your complete audio system with a multi-channel amplifier, built to supply constant power with low distortion.
![EPIC PRO Series](https://audiocontrol.com/cdn/shop/collections/epicpro-6x-right-transparent.png?crop=center&height=2560&v=1760560034&width=2560)
###
[
EPIC PRO Series
](https://audiocontrol.com/collections/epic-pro-series)
Loud is just the beginning. EPIC PRO speakers are engineered to project sound far and wide with refined accuracy. With precision-tuned components, lightweight materials, and ground-up California design and engineering, these speakers are built to get loud without wasting precious power from your hard-working amplifier.
![PNW Series](https://audiocontrol.com/cdn/shop/collections/1.PNW-65CS26.5InchComponentSpeakers100WRMSPairPNG.png?crop=center&height=2000&v=1758723864&width=2000)
###
[
PNW Series
](https://audiocontrol.com/collections/pacific-northwest-series)
Experience the vibrant landscapes of the Pacific Northwest through your music when you combine AudioControl’s legendary amplifiers with the PNW series of speakers. Trust us, you’ve never heard sound quite like this before.
![Coaxial Speakers](https://audiocontrol.com/cdn/shop/collections/1.PNW-656.5InchCoaxialSpeakers75WRMSPairPNG.png?crop=center&height=2000&v=1760020979&width=2000)
###
[
Coaxial Speakers
](https://audiocontrol.com/collections/coaxial-speakers)
AudioControl coaxial speakers deliver high-performance, full-range audio with simplified installation by combining the woofer and tweeter into a single unit.
![Midrange Speakers](https://audiocontrol.com/cdn/shop/collections/epicpro-6x-right-transparent_b36e7023-8994-49eb-8628-268442db44ad.png?crop=center&height=2560&v=1760560308&width=2560)
###
[
Midrange Speakers
](https://audiocontrol.com/collections/midrange-speakers)
AudioControl midrange speakers ensure critical vocal and instrument frequencies are reproduced with exceptional performance and detail, bridging the gap between the tweeter and the woofer.
![Component Speakers](https://audiocontrol.com/cdn/shop/collections/1.PNW-65CS26.5InchComponentSpeakers100WRMSPairPNG_bcbea104-c6d8-4be5-a9fa-22811f95cb54.png?crop=center&height=2000&v=1760562156&width=2000)
###
[
Component Speakers
](https://audiocontrol.com/collections/component-speakers)
AudioControl component speakers deliver superior stereo imaging and soundstage accuracy by allowing separate, optimal placement of the woofer and tweeter.
![Tweeters](https://audiocontrol.com/cdn/shop/collections/2.PNW-11InchTweeters100WRMSPairPNG.png?crop=center&height=2560&v=1760560568&width=2560)
###
[
Tweeters
](https://audiocontrol.com/collections/tweeters)
AudioControl tweeters providedetailed high-frequency reproduction and an expanded soundstage to bring vocals and instruments to life.
![EPICX Series](https://audiocontrol.com/cdn/shop/collections/1.EPICXSeries10InchDualVoiceCoilSubwoofer500WRMSPNG.png?crop=center&height=1200&v=1758723794&width=1200)
###
[
EPICX Series
](https://audiocontrol.com/collections/epic-x-series)
Experience the perfect fusion of relentless output and refined audio quality with the EPICX Series Subwoofers from AudioControl. Built for those who demand more than just loud, these subs deliver tight, accurate, low-end response.
![Spike Series](https://audiocontrol.com/cdn/shop/collections/1.SpikeSeries10InchHigh-PerformanceSubwoofer500WRMSPNG.png?crop=center&height=2000&v=1758723476&width=2000)
###
[
Spike Series
](https://audiocontrol.com/collections/spike-series)
Beautifully crafted to provide clear, precise bass for an immersive listening experience. Spike Series subwoofers feature a heavy-duty rigid basket for reduced resonance and distortion to produce more immersive bass.
![Space Series](https://audiocontrol.com/cdn/shop/collections/1.SpaceSeries10InchLow-ProfileSubwoofer_400WRMSPNG.png?crop=center&height=2000&v=1758723817&width=2000)
###
[
Space Series
](https://audiocontrol.com/collections/space-series)
Built with a structurally rigid low-profile basket, the Space Series subwoofers are the ultimate solution for deep, rich bass in a sleek, and slim design.
![Loaded Subwoofer Enclosures](https://audiocontrol.com/cdn/shop/collections/bb-spc-w12.png?crop=center&height=2000&v=1760561318&width=2000)
###
[
Loaded Subwoofer Enclosures
](https://audiocontrol.com/collections/enclosures)
Get ready to upgrade your car audio with our premium loaded subwoofer enclosures! Introducing our sleek and powerful enclosures, loaded with AudioControl Space or Spike Series subwoofers. Crafted with precision from high density wood fiber board, these enclosures are built to last and deliver superior sound quality.
![Loaded Enclosure Bass Packages](https://audiocontrol.com/cdn/shop/collections/1.TXJWB12JeepWranglerJKJL12InchSwingGateLoadedSealedSubwooferEnclosurePNG.png?crop=center&height=2000&v=1759255976&width=2000)
###
[
Loaded Enclosure Bass Packages
](https://audiocontrol.com/collections/subwoofer-bundles)
Check out our curated selection of universal and vehicle-specific subwoofer enclosure + mono amplifier + amp wiring kit packages to add substantial bass to your ride.
![Digital Signal Processors](https://audiocontrol.com/cdn/shop/collections/bb-dm810.png?crop=center&height=2000&v=1760620660&width=2000)
###
[
Digital Signal Processors
](https://audiocontrol.com/collections/digital-signal-processors)
AudioControl’s industry leading experience in signal processing combined with specially designed 24-bit DSP’s (digital signal processors) offers music enthusiasts the ultimate audio experience. Features like precise equalization, adjustable crossovers, signal delay, signal summing/distribution and AccuBASS® make AudioControl’s Digital Mobile Audio Processors top-of-the-line performers.
![The EPICENTER](https://audiocontrol.com/cdn/shop/collections/BB-TheEpicenterConcert.png?crop=center&height=2000&v=1760620743&width=2000)
###
[
The EPICENTER
](https://audiocontrol.com/collections/the-epicenter-processors)
The EPICENTER is the ORIGINAL Bass Restoration Processor. The centerpiece of many champion sound installation systems, The EPICENTER detects bass harmonics, then digitally recreates the underlying fundamental for the incredible punch and impact of live music.
![Line Output Converters](https://audiocontrol.com/cdn/shop/collections/bb-lc7i-pro.png?crop=center&height=2000&v=1760620786&width=2000)
###
[
Line Output Converters
](https://audiocontrol.com/collections/factory-system-upgrades)
Love your factory radio but hate the weak bass and flat sound? You don't have to choose between keeping your integrated dashboard controls and achieving incredible audio quality. The Line Output Converter (LOC) is the bridge your system needs.
![Accessories](https://audiocontrol.com/cdn/shop/collections/bb-acr-3-rev.png?crop=center&height=2000&v=1760620614&width=2000)
###
[
Accessories
](https://audiocontrol.com/collections/accessories)
Dash remotes, Bluetooth® controllers, power connectors, and more. Shop the extras you need to level up your setup. Same pro-level engineering, built to handle the toughest road conditions.
[
Shop All Amplifiers
](https://audiocontrol.com/collections/power-amplifiers)
[
Shop All Speakers
](https://audiocontrol.com/collections/speakers)
[
Shop All Subwoofers
](https://audiocontrol.com/collections/subwoofer)
[
Shop All Signal Processors
](https://audiocontrol.com/collections/digital-signal-processors)
[
Shop All Accessories
](https://audiocontrol.com/collections/accessories)

				if (!this.ticking) {

						const newScrolled = this.scrollY > this.scrollThreshold;

							this.scrolled = newScrolled;
							$store.global.updateTopBarVisibility();
							$store.global.updateAnnouncementBarVisibilityCheck();
							$store.global.updateHeaderVariables(this.scrolled);
						}
						this.ticking = false;
					});
					this.ticking = true;
				}
			},

			handleResize() {
				this.calculateScrollThreshold();
				$store.global.updateAnnouncementBarVisibilityCheck();

	<div class="contents" x-data="
		{
			query: '',
			async init() {
				await this.fetchSearchResults();
			},
			closeSearch() {
				this.query = '';
				this.$store.global.search = false;
			},
			async fetchSearchResults(query = '') {
				try {
					const baseUrl = '/search?view=header-search';
					const url = query.trim() ? `${baseUrl}&q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}` : baseUrl;

					const response = await fetch(url);

					if (!response.ok) {
						throw new Error(`HTTP ${response.status}: ${response.statusText}`);
					}

					const html = await response.text();

					const parser = new DOMParser();
					const doc = parser.parseFromString(html, 'text/html');

					const searchResults = doc.querySelector('#searchResults');

					if (searchResults) {
						this.$refs.results.innerHTML = searchResults.outerHTML;
					} else {
						console.warn('No #searchResults element found in response');
					}
				} catch (error) {
					console.error('Search failed:', error);
				}
			},
			async search() {
				await this.fetchSearchResults(this.query);
			},
		}
	" x-init="
		() => {

				}
			});
		}

<div aria-label="Cart Notification" x-transition:leave="transition-all duration-300" x-show="show" x-transition:enter="transition-all duration-300" aria-modal="true" x-transition:leave-end="opacity-0 translate-y-[100px]" x-trap.noscroll.inert.noautofocus="show" x-data="{ show: false, scrolled: false, loading: false }" style="display: none;" id="cart-notification" @click.self="show = false" x-transition:enter-start="opacity-0 translate-y-[100px]" x-transition:enter-end="opacity-100 translate-y-0" @keydown.escape.window="show = false" x-transition:leave-start="opacity-100 translate-y-0" @product-added.window="
		async e => {
			await fetch(e.detail.url)
				.then(response => response.text())
				.then(html => {
					const parser = new DOMParser();
					const doc = parser.parseFromString(html, 'text/html');
					const content = doc.querySelector('#cart-notification');

					$root.innerHTML = content.innerHTML;
					show = true;
				})
		}
	" class="bg-grayscale-100/90 fixed inset-0 z-[200] flex justify-center px-[16px] pt-[64px] backdrop-blur-[7px] md:items-end" role="dialog">
	<div @cart-add.window="
			async e => {
				if (e.detail.data.upsell) {

					const id = e.detail.data.items[0].id;
					loading = id;

					const isMobile = window.innerWidth < 768;

					await fetch(e.detail.data.url)
						.then(response => response.text())
						.then(async html => {
							const parser = new DOMParser();
							const doc = parser.parseFromString(html, 'text/html');
							const newContent = doc.querySelector('#cart-notification [data-product]');


							const upsell = document.querySelector(`[data-upsell='${id}']`);
							const upsellParent = upsell.parentNode.parentNode;
							const upsellClone = upsell.cloneNode(true);
							const product = $refs.product.querySelector('[data-product]');
							const productClone = product.cloneNode(true);

							upsellParent.style.transition = 'height 0.3s ease-in-out';
							upsellParent.style.height = upsellParent.offsetHeight + 'px';

							upsellClone.style = `
								position: absolute;
								z-index: 200;
								top: ${upsellParent.offsetTop}px;
								left: ${upsellParent.offsetLeft}px;
								width: ${upsellParent.offsetWidth}px;
								transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
							`;

							productClone.style = `
								position: absolute;
								z-index: 200;
								top: ${product.offsetTop}px;
								left: ${product.offsetLeft}px;
								width: ${product.offsetWidth}px;
								transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
							`;

							$refs.upsells.appendChild(upsellClone);
							$refs.product.appendChild(productClone);

							upsellParent.style.opacity = 0;

							product.style.opacity = 0;
							product.style.transform = isMobile ? `translateY(50%)` : `translateX(50%)`;

							product.innerHTML = newContent.innerHTML;

							upsell.parentNode.addEventListener('transitionend', async (e) => {
								if (e.propertyName === 'height') {
									upsellParent.remove();
								}
							}, { once: true });

							upsellClone.addEventListener('transitionend', async () => {
								upsellParent.style.height = '0px';
								upsellClone.remove();
							}, { once: true });

							productClone.addEventListener('transitionend', async () => {
								productClone.remove();
							}, { once: true });

							product.addEventListener('transitionend', async () => {
								product.style.transition = 'none';
							}, { once: true });

							await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 10));

							loading = false;

							product.style.transition = 'all 0.3s ease-in-out';

							if (isMobile) $refs.container.scrollTo(0, 0);

							upsellClone.style.transform = isMobile ? `translateY(-50%)` : `translateX(-50%)`;
							upsellClone.style.opacity = 0;

							productClone.style.transform = isMobile ? `translateY(-50%)` : `translateX(-50%)`;
							productClone.style.opacity = 0;

							product.style.transform = isMobile ? `translateY(0%)` : `translateX(0%)`;
							product.style.opacity = 1;
						})
				}
			}
		" @click.stop="" class="relative mx-auto mt-auto flex h-auto max-h-full flex-1 flex-col  md:max-w-[530px] ">
		<button @click="show = false" class="card flex-center absolute right-0 bottom-full mb-[16px] size-[32px] rounded-full text-white/60 transition hover:text-white lg:right-auto lg:left-full lg:mb-[-16px]" aria-label="Close" aria-controls="cart-notification">

		{
			query: '',
			async init() {
				await this.fetchSearchResults();
			},
			closeSearch() {
				this.query = '';
				this.$store.global.search = false;
			},
			async fetchSearchResults(query = '') {
				try {
					const baseUrl = '/search?view=header-search';
					const url = query.trim() ? `${baseUrl}&q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}` : baseUrl;

					const response = await fetch(url);

					if (!response.ok) {
						throw new Error(`HTTP ${response.status}: ${response.statusText}`);
					}

					const html = await response.text();

					const parser = new DOMParser();
					const doc = parser.parseFromString(html, 'text/html');

					const searchResults = doc.querySelector('#searchResults');

					if (searchResults) {
						this.$refs.results.innerHTML = searchResults.outerHTML;
					} else {
						console.warn('No #searchResults element found in response');
					}
				} catch (error) {
					console.error('Search failed:', error);
				}
			},
			async search() {
				await this.fetchSearchResults(this.query);
			},
		}
	" x-init="

				}
			});
		}

<div role="dialog" @product-added.window="
		async e => {
			await fetch(e.detail.url)
				.then(response => response.text())
				.then(html => {
					const parser = new DOMParser();
					const doc = parser.parseFromString(html, 'text/html');
					const content = doc.querySelector('#cart-notification');

					$root.innerHTML = content.innerHTML;
					show = true;
				})
		}
	" @keydown.escape.window="show = false" x-transition:leave="transition-all duration-300" style="display: none;" @click.self="show = false" aria-label="Cart Notification" id="cart-notification" x-data="{ show: false, scrolled: false, loading: false }" x-transition:enter="transition-all duration-300" x-transition:leave-end="opacity-0 translate-y-[100px]" x-transition:leave-start="opacity-100 translate-y-0" x-trap.noscroll.inert.noautofocus="show" x-transition:enter-end="opacity-100 translate-y-0" x-show="show" x-transition:enter-start="opacity-0 translate-y-[100px]" aria-modal="true" class="bg-grayscale-100/90 fixed inset-0 z-[200] flex justify-center px-[16px] pt-[64px] backdrop-blur-[7px] md:items-end">
	<div @cart-add.window="
			async e => {
				if (e.detail.data.upsell) {

					const id = e.detail.data.items[0].id;
					loading = id;

					const isMobile = window.innerWidth < 768;

					await fetch(e.detail.data.url)
						.then(response => response.text())
						.then(async html => {
							const parser = new DOMParser();
							const doc = parser.parseFromString(html, 'text/html');
							const newContent = doc.querySelector('#cart-notification [data-product]');


							const upsell = document.querySelector(`[data-upsell='${id}']`);
							const upsellParent = upsell.parentNode.parentNode;
							const upsellClone = upsell.cloneNode(true);
							const product = $refs.product.querySelector('[data-product]');
							const productClone = product.cloneNode(true);

							upsellParent.style.transition = 'height 0.3s ease-in-out';
							upsellParent.style.height = upsellParent.offsetHeight + 'px';

							upsellClone.style = `
								position: absolute;
								z-index: 200;
								top: ${upsellParent.offsetTop}px;
								left: ${upsellParent.offsetLeft}px;
								width: ${upsellParent.offsetWidth}px;
								transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
							`;

							productClone.style = `
								position: absolute;
								z-index: 200;
								top: ${product.offsetTop}px;
								left: ${product.offsetLeft}px;
								width: ${product.offsetWidth}px;
								transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
							`;

							$refs.upsells.appendChild(upsellClone);
							$refs.product.appendChild(productClone);

							upsellParent.style.opacity = 0;

							product.style.opacity = 0;
							product.style.transform = isMobile ? `translateY(50%)` : `translateX(50%)`;

							product.innerHTML = newContent.innerHTML;

							upsell.parentNode.addEventListener('transitionend', async (e) => {
								if (e.propertyName === 'height') {
									upsellParent.remove();
								}
							}, { once: true });

							upsellClone.addEventListener('transitionend', async () => {
								upsellParent.style.height = '0px';
								upsellClone.remove();
							}, { once: true });

							productClone.addEventListener('transitionend', async () => {
								productClone.remove();
							}, { once: true });

							product.addEventListener('transitionend', async () => {
								product.style.transition = 'none';
							}, { once: true });

							await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 10));

							loading = false;

							product.style.transition = 'all 0.3s ease-in-out';

							if (isMobile) $refs.container.scrollTo(0, 0);

							upsellClone.style.transform = isMobile ? `translateY(-50%)` : `translateX(-50%)`;
							upsellClone.style.opacity = 0;

							productClone.style.transform = isMobile ? `translateY(-50%)` : `translateX(-50%)`;
							productClone.style.opacity = 0;

							product.style.transform = isMobile ? `translateY(0%)` : `translateX(0%)`;
							product.style.opacity = 1;
						})
				}
			}
		" @click.stop="" class="relative mx-auto mt-auto flex h-auto max-h-full flex-1 flex-col  md:max-w-[530px] ">
		<button aria-controls="cart-notification" @click="show = false" aria-label="Close" class="card flex-center absolute right-0 bottom-full mb-[16px] size-[32px] rounded-full text-white/60 transition hover:text-white lg:right-auto lg:left-full lg:mb-[-16px]">

			" x-data="{ show: false }" class="from-grayscale-100/0 to-grayscale-100/50 fixed inset-x-[16px] bottom-0 z-[2] bg-gradient-to-b p-[16px] transition md:hidden" x-transition:enter-end="opacity-100 translate-y-0" x-transition:enter-start="opacity-0 translate-y-full" x-transition:leave-start="opacity-100 translate-y-0" x-transition:leave-end="opacity-0 translate-y-full" x-show="show">

AudioControl brings you our most advanced line of LOCs yet. OEM integration has never been easier with the host of intelligent built-in features like LMC™ (Load Matching Circuit), allowing even the most finicky factory sound systems to no longer be an obstacle to great sound. Installer-friendly trigger modes offer flexibility and an expedited installation time since the units can be turned on via GTO™ Signal Sense (DC offset), audio signal sensing, or standard remote 12 volt input. All PRO series products feature AudioContol’s patented AccuBASS® for restoring low frequency output diminished by factory processing, and an ACR-1 level control is included to dial in the perfect level for your subwoofer right from the comfort of the driver’s seat. The Pro series ensures that you will start with the clean, powerful signal you need to take your system from sounding good to sounding great.
### FEATURES
* Six channels of active speaker-level inputs (up to 40V input handling)
* Fixed and variable outputs with discrete-level controls
* AccuBASS® processing for correction of bass roll-off
* Load Selection Switch
* GTOTMSignal Sensing
* Ground Isolation Switch
* ACR-1 dash remote included
* Compact design
### SPECIFICATIONS
#### INPUTS
* Speaker Level Input: 3 (6 channels)
* Maximum Speaker Level Input: 40 Vrms / 400 W (20kΩ setting)
* Input Impedance (selectable): 20Ω, 60Ω, 20kΩ
#### OUTPUTS
* Preamp Outputs: 6 (4 channels main, 2 channels bass)
* Maximum Output Level: 9.5Vrms/13V peak
* Output Gain: +/- 15 dB
* Output Impedance: 150Ω
#### PERFORMANCE
* Total Harmonic Distortion: 0.01%
* Signal to Noise: >124 dB
* Frequency Response: 20 Hz – 20 kHz
#### CONTROL
* Remote In / GTO™ Signal Sense / Audio Sense
* 12VDC Remote Out (always active when unit is on)
#### GENERAL
* Current Draw: 330 mA
* Recommended Fuse Rating: 2 A
#### WEIGHTS & DIMENSIONS
* Dimensions: 7″L x 5.1″D x 1.14″H (including speaker connectors)
* Weight: 1.15 lbs.

<header x-trap.noscroll.noautofocus="activeDropdown !== null" x-init="
		$watch('activeDropdown', v => $dispatch('dropdown-toggle'));

		$nextTick(() => {
			calculateScrollThreshold();
			scrollY = window.scrollY;
			scrolled = scrollY > scrollThreshold;

			ticking: false,

			activeDropdown: null,

			calculateScrollThreshold() {
				const topBarHeightRaw = getComputedStyle(document.documentElement).getPropertyValue('--top-bar-height');
				let topBarHeight;
				if (topBarHeightRaw.includes('rem')) {
					const remValue = parseFloat(topBarHeightRaw);
					const rootFontSize = parseFloat(getComputedStyle(document.documentElement).fontSize);
					topBarHeight = remValue * rootFontSize;
				} else {

	" class="contents" x-data="
		{
			query: '',
			async init() {
				await this.fetchSearchResults();
			},
			closeSearch() {
				this.query = '';
				this.$store.global.search = false;
			},
			async fetchSearchResults(query = '') {
				try {
					const baseUrl = '/search?view=header-search';
					const url = query.trim() ? `${baseUrl}&q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}` : baseUrl;

					const response = await fetch(url);

					if (!response.ok) {
						throw new Error(`HTTP ${response.status}: ${response.statusText}`);
					}

					const html = await response.text();

					const parser = new DOMParser();
					const doc = parser.parseFromString(html, 'text/html');

					const searchResults = doc.querySelector('#searchResults');

					if (searchResults) {
						this.$refs.results.innerHTML = searchResults.outerHTML;
					} else {
						console.warn('No #searchResults element found in response');
					}
				} catch (error) {
					console.error('Search failed:', error);
				}
			},
			async search() {
				await this.fetchSearchResults(this.query);
			},
		}
	">

<div x-transition:enter-start="opacity-0 translate-y-[100px]" x-trap.noscroll.inert.noautofocus="show" @product-added.window="
		async e => {
			await fetch(e.detail.url)
				.then(response => response.text())
				.then(html => {
					const parser = new DOMParser();
					const doc = parser.parseFromString(html, 'text/html');
					const content = doc.querySelector('#cart-notification');

					$root.innerHTML = content.innerHTML;
					show = true;
				})
		}
	" id="cart-notification" x-show="show" style="display: none;" role="dialog" x-transition:enter="transition-all duration-300" aria-modal="true" class="bg-grayscale-100/90 fixed inset-0 z-[200] flex justify-center px-[16px] pt-[64px] backdrop-blur-[7px] md:items-end" x-data="{ show: false, scrolled: false, loading: false }" x-transition:leave-start="opacity-100 translate-y-0" x-transition:leave-end="opacity-0 translate-y-[100px]" @click.self="show = false" x-transition:enter-end="opacity-100 translate-y-0" @keydown.escape.window="show = false" aria-label="Cart Notification" x-transition:leave="transition-all duration-300">
	<div class="relative mx-auto mt-auto flex h-auto max-h-full flex-1 flex-col  md:max-w-[530px] " @cart-add.window="
			async e => {
				if (e.detail.data.upsell) {

					const id = e.detail.data.items[0].id;
					loading = id;

					const isMobile = window.innerWidth < 768;

					await fetch(e.detail.data.url)
						.then(response => response.text())
						.then(async html => {
							const parser = new DOMParser();
							const doc = parser.parseFromString(html, 'text/html');
							const newContent = doc.querySelector('#cart-notification [data-product]');


							const upsell = document.querySelector(`[data-upsell='${id}']`);
							const upsellParent = upsell.parentNode.parentNode;
							const upsellClone = upsell.cloneNode(true);
							const product = $refs.product.querySelector('[data-product]');
							const productClone = product.cloneNode(true);

							upsellParent.style.transition = 'height 0.3s ease-in-out';
							upsellParent.style.height = upsellParent.offsetHeight + 'px';

							upsellClone.style = `
								position: absolute;
								z-index: 200;
								top: ${upsellParent.offsetTop}px;
								left: ${upsellParent.offsetLeft}px;
								width: ${upsellParent.offsetWidth}px;
								transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
							`;

							productClone.style = `
								position: absolute;
								z-index: 200;
								top: ${product.offsetTop}px;
								left: ${product.offsetLeft}px;
								width: ${product.offsetWidth}px;
								transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
							`;

							$refs.upsells.appendChild(upsellClone);
							$refs.product.appendChild(productClone);

							upsellParent.style.opacity = 0;

							product.style.opacity = 0;
							product.style.transform = isMobile ? `translateY(50%)` : `translateX(50%)`;

							product.innerHTML = newContent.innerHTML;

							upsell.parentNode.addEventListener('transitionend', async (e) => {
								if (e.propertyName === 'height') {
									upsellParent.remove();
								}
							}, { once: true });

							upsellClone.addEventListener('transitionend', async () => {
								upsellParent.style.height = '0px';
								upsellClone.remove();
							}, { once: true });

							productClone.addEventListener('transitionend', async () => {
								productClone.remove();
							}, { once: true });

							product.addEventListener('transitionend', async () => {
								product.style.transition = 'none';
							}, { once: true });

							await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 10));

							loading = false;

							product.style.transition = 'all 0.3s ease-in-out';

							if (isMobile) $refs.container.scrollTo(0, 0);

							upsellClone.style.transform = isMobile ? `translateY(-50%)` : `translateX(-50%)`;
							upsellClone.style.opacity = 0;

							productClone.style.transform = isMobile ? `translateY(-50%)` : `translateX(-50%)`;
							productClone.style.opacity = 0;

							product.style.transform = isMobile ? `translateY(0%)` : `translateX(0%)`;
							product.style.opacity = 1;
						})
				}
			}
		" @click.stop="">
		<button aria-label="Close" class="card flex-center absolute right-0 bottom-full mb-[16px] size-[32px] rounded-full text-white/60 transition hover:text-white lg:right-auto lg:left-full lg:mb-[-16px]" @click="show = false" aria-controls="cart-notification">
			






<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="size-[20px]" fill="none" aria-hidden="true" width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20">
    <path stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" d="M5.13867 5.13864L14.8614 14.8614" stroke-linejoin="round"></path>
    <path stroke-width="2" stroke="currentColor" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" d="M14.8613 5.13864L5.13861 14.8614"></path>

#
The EPICENTER Micro PRO Bass Restoration Processor & Line Output Converter
$229.00
$0.00
-0%
Building on the powerful features of The EPICENTER Micro and everything you have come to know and love about AudioControl’s legendary bass processing, The EPICENTER Micro PRO adds more control and tuning potential for those who wish to push even further into the unexplored outer realms of extreme bass performance.
Read More
Add to Cart
$229.00
Add to Cart
$229.00
Building on the powerful features of The EPICENTER Micro and everything you have come to know and love about AudioControl’s legendary bass processing, TheEPICENTER Micro PRO adds more control and tuning potential for those who wish to push even further into the unexplored outer realms of extreme bass performance.
**Bass Maximizer**– The EPICENTERMicro PRO is designed to reproduce low frequency information by looking at the upper frequency ranges and detecting musical harmonics. These harmonics then allow The EPICENTERMicro PRO to drop down a few octaves and reproduce the “missing” bass notes.
**Line Output Converter** - Beyond maximizing bass, The EPICENTERMicro PRO is a line output converter packed with premier
OEM integration features like AudioControl’s Load Matching Circuit (LMC) with Load Select, multiple Trigger Modes, and selectable Ground Isolation. For power-users, the PFM Subsonic Filter can be selected or bypassed and Output Voltage can be configured for up to 10 Volts!
### FEATURES
**• AudioControl’s Original Digital Bass Restoration Circuit:** Restore missing low notes and transform flat audio into rich, powerful bass you can truly feel.**
• ParaBASS® Controls for Bass Shaping: **Precisely sculpt and fine-tune your bass to perfectly match your music, vehicle, and personal preference.**
• Selectable PFM Subsonic Filter with Bypass: **Protect your speakers and ensure tighter, more controlled bass by filtering out inaudible, power-wasting frequencies.**
• Built-in Line Driver for Optimal Output Voltage:**Boosts your audio signal for a strong, clean path to your amplifiers, minimizing noise and maximizing sound quality.**
• Balanced Line Level Inputs: **Helps eliminate electrical interference and hum, delivering crystal-clear sound even in noisy car environments.**
• Speaker-Level Inputs: **Seamlessly integrate a factory stereo without needing RCA outputs, saving money and simplifying upgrades.**
• Load Selection Switch: **Ensures perfect compatibility with modern factory stereos, preventing issues and guaranteeing a smooth upgrade.**
• GTO and Audio Sense Turn On: **Automatically powers up the unit when your stereo is active, making installation simpler and operation seamless.**
• 10 Volt Maximum Output Level: **Sends a strong, clean signal to your amplifier, unleashing maximum power and dynamic impact.**
• Conformally Coated PCB: **A protective layer against moisture, dust, and temperature swings, improving the durability and reliability of The Epicenter Micro PRO.**
• ACR-4 Dual-Knob Remote Level Control Included:**Command your bass instantly from the driver's seat, fine-tuning levels and bass restoration on the fly.
### SPECIFICATIONS
#### INPUTS
* Maximum Line Level Input: 10Vrms
* Maximum Speaker Level Input: 40V / 400W (20kΩ setting)
* Line Level Input Impedance: 7kΩ
* Speaker Level Input Impedance (selectable): 20Ω, 60Ω, 20kΩ
#### OUTPUTS
* Maximum Output Level (THD<1%): 9Vrms, 13V peak
* Output Impedance: 150Ω
#### PERFORMANCE
* Total Harmonic Distortion: 0.03%
* Signal to Noise: >105 dB
* Frequency Response: 10 Hz – 22 kHz ±1 dB
* PFM Filter (High Pass): Selectable 24 Hz, 15 Hz, or Bypass
#### CONTROL
* Remote In / GTO™ Signal Sense / Audio Sense
* 12VDC Remote Out (always active when unit is on)
#### GENERAL
* Power Supply: High Headroom PWM Switching
* Current Draw: 300 mA
* Recommended Fuse Rating: 1 A
#### WEIGHTS & DIMENSIONS
* Dimensions: 8″L x 3″D x 1″H
* Weight: 0.9 lbs
**IN THE BOX**:The Epicenter Micro PRO, ACR-4, Remote Cable,Speaker and Power connectors, [User Manual](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0581/2240/3900/files/EPICENTER-MICRO-PRO_UG_RevA.pdf?v=1753728843)

<header x-data="
		{
			scrollY: 0,
			scrolled: false,
			scrollThreshold: 0,
			ticking: false,

			activeDropdown: null,

			calculateScrollThreshold() {
				const topBarHeightRaw = getComputedStyle(document.documentElement).getPropertyValue('--top-bar-height');
				let topBarHeight;
				if (topBarHeightRaw.includes('rem')) {
					const remValue = parseFloat(topBarHeightRaw);
					const rootFontSize = parseFloat(getComputedStyle(document.documentElement).fontSize);
					topBarHeight = remValue * rootFontSize;
				} else {
					topBarHeight = parseFloat(topBarHeightRaw);
				}
				this.scrollThreshold = topBarHeight + ($store.global.announcementBarVisible && $store.global.announcementBarHeight > 0 ? $store.global.announcementBarHeight : 0);
			},

			handleScroll() {
				if (!this.ticking) {
					requestAnimationFrame(() => {
						this.scrollY = window.scrollY;
						const newScrolled = this.scrollY > this.scrollThreshold;
						if (newScrolled !== this.scrolled) {
							this.scrolled = newScrolled;
							$store.global.updateTopBarVisibility();
							$store.global.updateAnnouncementBarVisibilityCheck();
							$store.global.updateHeaderVariables(this.scrolled);
						}
						this.ticking = false;
					});
					this.ticking = true;
				}
			},

			handleResize() {
				this.calculateScrollThreshold();
				$store.global.updateAnnouncementBarVisibilityCheck();
				$store.global.updateHeaderVariables(this.scrolled);
			},

			setActiveDropdown(value) {
				this.activeDropdown = value;
			},
		}

	<div x-data="
		{
			query: '',
			async init() {
				await this.fetchSearchResults();
			},
			closeSearch() {
				this.query = '';
				this.$store.global.search = false;
			},
			async fetchSearchResults(query = '') {
				try {
					const baseUrl = '/search?view=header-search';
					const url = query.trim() ? `${baseUrl}&q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}` : baseUrl;

					const response = await fetch(url);

					if (!response.ok) {
						throw new Error(`HTTP ${response.status}: ${response.statusText}`);
					}

					const html = await response.text();

					const parser = new DOMParser();
					const doc = parser.parseFromString(html, 'text/html');

					const searchResults = doc.querySelector('#searchResults');

					if (searchResults) {
						this.$refs.results.innerHTML = searchResults.outerHTML;
					} else {
						console.warn('No #searchResults element found in response');
					}
				} catch (error) {
					console.error('Search failed:', error);
				}
			},
			async search() {
				await this.fetchSearchResults(this.query);
			},
		}
	" x-init="

			});
		}

				<h3><strong>What is a Crossover</strong></h3>
<p>A crossover is a device or circuit that separates an audio signal into different frequency ranges, directing each range to the appropriate speaker.</p>
<p> </p>
<p>The main function of a crossover is to prevent speakers from receiving frequencies they can't handle, which can damage them. For instance, sending subwoofer frequencies to a tweeter can "fry" it due to the incompatible low frequencies. Tweeters are meant to handle high frequencies. Crossovers ensure each speaker receives only the frequencies it's designed to play, enhancing sound quality and efficiency.</p>
<p> </p>
<p>Crossovers are commonly used in multi-driver speaker systems like 2-way or 3-way component systems. In a 2-way system, a crossover typically splits the signal between a mid-range speaker for lower frequencies and a tweeter for higher frequencies.</p>
<p><strong> </strong></p>
<h3><strong>Active Crossovers</strong></h3>
<p>Active crossovers use electronic components like operational amplifiers to divide audio signals before amplification. They offer more flexibility and precision but need more power.</p>
<p>Active crossovers offer several advantages over passive ones:</p>
<ul>
<li>
<strong>Flexibility:</strong> Active crossovers provide more flexibility than passive crossovers, allowing for precise adjustments to crossover frequencies, slopes, and other settings. This customization lets you tailor the audio system to match specific speakers and your listening environment.</li>
<li>
<strong>Adjustability:</strong> Active crossovers often have adjustable crossover frequencies and slopes, allowing for precise tuning. This customization lets you fine-tune the sound to match your preferences or the needs of different audio sources.</li>
<li>
<strong>Signal Processing:</strong> Active crossovers offer advanced signal processing features like equalization, phase correction, and time alignment. These features can enhance audio system performance and compensate for speaker or room imperfections.</li>
<li>
<strong>Independent Amplification:</strong> Active crossover systems often use individual amplifiers for each driver (like woofers, midrange, or tweeters). This gives you more control over each driver and ensures they receive enough power for the best performance.</li>
<li>
<strong>Low Distortion:</strong> Active crossovers minimize distortion compared to passive crossovers, especially at high power levels. This is because they work on the audio signal before it's amplified, reducing the chance of signal quality issues.</li>
<li>
<strong>Bi-Amping and Tri-Amping:</strong> Bi-amping and tri-amping are techniques made possible by active crossovers. These techniques involve using separate amplifiers for different frequency ranges, offering more precise control over each. For example, bi-amping uses two amplifiers (one for low frequencies and one for high frequencies), while tri-amping uses three (for low, mid, and high frequencies).</li>
</ul>
<p> </p>
<p>Examples of active crossover devices include <a href="https://audiocontrol.com/collections/digital-signal-processors">Digital Signal Processors</a> (DSPs) like AudioControl <a href="https://audiocontrol.com/collections/matrix-dsp-amplifiers">D-Series amplifiers</a> and DM-Series Processors. The D-6.1200 is one such example. AudioControl <a href="https://audiocontrol.com/collections/lc-series-amplifiers">LC line amplifiers</a> also have built-in active crossovers, offering a more affordable way to actively cross over amplifier outputs, similar to the D-Series.</p>
<div style="text-align: center;"><a href="https://stingersolutions.com/products/audiocontrol-d61200-amp"><img style="float: none;" alt="AudioControl D - 6.1200 6 - Channel DSP Amplifier" src="https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0311/6485/8503/files/audiocontrol-d-61200-6-channel-dsp-amplifier-993303_480x480.jpg?v=1718878651"></a></div>
<h3><strong><br>Passive Crossovers</strong></h3>
<p>Passive crossovers use components like capacitors, inductors, and resistors to split the audio signal after it's amplified. They don't need external power but can introduce signal loss due to the components.</p>
<p> </p>
<p>Unlike active crossovers, passive ones are placed after the amplifier, which is why signal loss occurs. AudioControl PNW Series <a href="https://audiocontrol.com/products/pnw-65cs2-component-speakers-100w-rms">6.5”</a> and <a href="https://audiocontrol.com/products/pnw-69-coaxial-speakers-75w-rms">6x9”</a> <a href="https://audiocontrol.com/collections/component-speakers">Component Speaker Kits</a> include the PNW-LF1 & PNW-HF1, which have a single input and split the output into tweeter and woofer outputs.</p>
<div style="text-align: center;"><img src="https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0311/6485/8503/files/passive_crossovers_480x480.png?v=1728931548" style="float: none;" alt="audiocontrol passive crossovers"></div>
<p> </p>
<p>Some passive crossovers also have adjustable tweeter output levels for easier amplifier gain matching. It's also important to note that passive crossovers have wattage limits. Exceeding these limits can damage the crossover or speakers.</p>
<p><meta charset="utf-8"><span>The <a href="https://audiocontrol.com/products/pnw-xn3">PNW-XN3 is a 3-way passive crossover network</a> designed to expand an existing 2-way component speaker system into a full 3-way setup by adding a dedicated midrange driver to your midbass and tweeter combination. It is an ideal solution when active crossovers or a DSP are not available or simply do not fit the budget.</span></p>
<div style="text-align: center;"><img style="margin-bottom: 16px; float: none;" alt="passive crossover network car audio" src="https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0581/2240/3900/files/PNW-XN3_02_96d85add-7416-43d6-a6a7-451cd6690a0b_480x480.jpg?v=1759082473"></div>
<p> </p>
<h3><strong>Active vs. Passive Crossovers Summary: </strong></h3>
<p> </p>
<table style="width: 100%; height: 213.563px;">
<tbody>
<tr style="height: 35.5938px;">
<td style="width: 28.6718%; height: 35.5938px;">
<p><strong>Feature</strong></p>
</td>
<td style="width: 36.1384%; height: 35.5938px;">
<p><strong>Active Crossover</strong></p>
</td>
<td style="width: 31.2611%; height: 35.5938px;">
<p><strong>Passive Crossover</strong></p>
</td>
</tr>
<tr style="height: 35.5938px;">
<td style="width: 28.6718%; height: 35.5938px;">
<p>Components</p>
</td>
<td style="width: 36.1384%; height: 35.5938px;">
<p>Amplifier, crossover network</p>
</td>
<td style="width: 31.2611%; height: 35.5938px;">
<p>Crossover network</p>
</td>
</tr>
<tr style="height: 35.5938px;">
<td style="width: 28.6718%; height: 35.5938px;">
<p>Placement</p>
</td>
<td style="width: 36.1384%; height: 35.5938px;">
<p>Before the amplifier</p>
</td>
<td style="width: 31.2611%; height: 35.5938px;">
<p>After the amplifier</p>
</td>
</tr>
<tr style="height: 35.5938px;">
<td style="width: 28.6718%; height: 35.5938px;">
<p>Frequency Adjustment</p>
</td>
<td style="width: 36.1384%; height: 35.5938px;">
<p>More precise control</p>
</td>
<td style="width: 31.2611%; height: 35.5938px;">
<p>Less precise control</p>
</td>
</tr>
<tr style="height: 35.5938px;">
<td style="width: 28.6718%; height: 35.5938px;">
<p>Phase Alignment</p>
</td>
<td style="width: 36.1384%; height: 35.5938px;">
<p>Better control</p>
</td>
<td style="width: 31.2611%; height: 35.5938px;">
<p>More difficult to control</p>
</td>
</tr>
<tr style="height: 35.5938px;">
<td style="width: 28.6718%; height: 35.5938px;">
<p>Cost</p>
</td>
<td style="width: 36.1384%; height: 35.5938px;">
<p>Generally more expensive</p>
</td>
<td style="width: 31.2611%; height: 35.5938px;">
<p>Generally less expensive</p>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<p> </p>
<p>To conclude, crossovers are essential for ensuring each speaker in a <a href="https://audiocontrol.com/">car audio</a> system receives the correct frequencies, leading to a balanced and accurate sound across the full range of audible frequencies. Active crossovers make sense for those looking for more precision and control in their audio. Passive crossovers provide less fine-tuning but are cheaper to integrate.</p>
			</div>

<div x-trap.noscroll.inert.noautofocus="show" x-data="{ show: false, scrolled: false, loading: false }" x-transition:leave="transition-all duration-300" aria-label="Cart Notification" x-transition:enter="transition-all duration-300" x-transition:enter-start="opacity-0 translate-y-[100px]" x-transition:enter-end="opacity-100 translate-y-0" x-transition:leave-start="opacity-100 translate-y-0" @click.self="show = false" style="display: none;" @keydown.escape.window="show = false" id="cart-notification" @product-added.window="
		async e => {
			await fetch(e.detail.url)
				.then(response => response.text())
				.then(html => {
					const parser = new DOMParser();
					const doc = parser.parseFromString(html, 'text/html');
					const content = doc.querySelector('#cart-notification');

					$root.innerHTML = content.innerHTML;
					show = true;
				})
		}
	" role="dialog" x-transition:leave-end="opacity-0 translate-y-[100px]" aria-modal="true" x-show="show" class="bg-grayscale-100/90 fixed inset-0 z-[200] flex justify-center px-[16px] pt-[64px] backdrop-blur-[7px] md:items-end">
	<div class="relative mx-auto mt-auto flex h-auto max-h-full flex-1 flex-col  md:max-w-[530px] " @click.stop="" @cart-add.window="
			async e => {
				if (e.detail.data.upsell) {

					const id = e.detail.data.items[0].id;
					loading = id;

					const isMobile = window.innerWidth < 768;

					await fetch(e.detail.data.url)
						.then(response => response.text())
						.then(async html => {
							const parser = new DOMParser();
							const doc = parser.parseFromString(html, 'text/html');
							const newContent = doc.querySelector('#cart-notification [data-product]');


							const upsell = document.querySelector(`[data-upsell='${id}']`);
							const upsellParent = upsell.parentNode.parentNode;
							const upsellClone = upsell.cloneNode(true);
							const product = $refs.product.querySelector('[data-product]');
							const productClone = product.cloneNode(true);

							upsellParent.style.transition = 'height 0.3s ease-in-out';
							upsellParent.style.height = upsellParent.offsetHeight + 'px';

							upsellClone.style = `
								position: absolute;
								z-index: 200;
								top: ${upsellParent.offsetTop}px;
								left: ${upsellParent.offsetLeft}px;
								width: ${upsellParent.offsetWidth}px;
								transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
							`;

							productClone.style = `
								position: absolute;
								z-index: 200;
								top: ${product.offsetTop}px;
								left: ${product.offsetLeft}px;
								width: ${product.offsetWidth}px;
								transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
							`;

							$refs.upsells.appendChild(upsellClone);
							$refs.product.appendChild(productClone);

							upsellParent.style.opacity = 0;

							product.style.opacity = 0;
							product.style.transform = isMobile ? `translateY(50%)` : `translateX(50%)`;

							product.innerHTML = newContent.innerHTML;

							upsell.parentNode.addEventListener('transitionend', async (e) => {
								if (e.propertyName === 'height') {
									upsellParent.remove();
								}
							}, { once: true });

							upsellClone.addEventListener('transitionend', async () => {
								upsellParent.style.height = '0px';
								upsellClone.remove();
							}, { once: true });

							productClone.addEventListener('transitionend', async () => {
								productClone.remove();
							}, { once: true });

							product.addEventListener('transitionend', async () => {
								product.style.transition = 'none';
							}, { once: true });

							await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 10));

							loading = false;

							product.style.transition = 'all 0.3s ease-in-out';

							if (isMobile) $refs.container.scrollTo(0, 0);

							upsellClone.style.transform = isMobile ? `translateY(-50%)` : `translateX(-50%)`;
							upsellClone.style.opacity = 0;

							productClone.style.transform = isMobile ? `translateY(-50%)` : `translateX(-50%)`;

							product.style.opacity = 1;
						})
				}
			}

			"name": "What is an Active vs Passive Crossover in a Car Audio System?",
			"articleBody": "What is a Crossover\nA crossover is a device or circuit that separates an audio signal into different frequency ranges, directing each range to the appropriate speaker.\n \nThe main function of a crossover is to prevent speakers from receiving frequencies they can\u0026#39;t handle, which can damage them. For instance, sending subwoofer frequencies to a tweeter can \u0026quot;fry\u0026quot; it due to the incompatible low frequencies. Tweeters are meant to handle high frequencies. Crossovers ensure each speaker receives only the frequencies it\u0026#39;s designed to play, enhancing sound quality and efficiency.\n \nCrossovers are commonly used in multi-driver speaker systems like 2-way or 3-way component systems. In a 2-way system, a crossover typically splits the signal between a mid-range speaker for lower frequencies and a tweeter for higher frequencies.\n \nActive Crossovers\nActive crossovers use electronic components like operational amplifiers to divide audio signals before amplification. They offer more flexibility and precision but need more power.\nActive crossovers offer several advantages over passive ones:\n\n\nFlexibility: Active crossovers provide more flexibility than passive crossovers, allowing for precise adjustments to crossover frequencies, slopes, and other settings. This customization lets you tailor the audio system to match specific speakers and your listening environment.\n\nAdjustability: Active crossovers often have adjustable crossover frequencies and slopes, allowing for precise tuning. This customization lets you fine-tune the sound to match your preferences or the needs of different audio sources.\n\nSignal Processing: Active crossovers offer advanced signal processing features like equalization, phase correction, and time alignment. These features can enhance audio system performance and compensate for speaker or room imperfections.\n\nIndependent Amplification: Active crossover systems often use individual amplifiers for each driver (like woofers, midrange, or tweeters). This gives you more control over each driver and ensures they receive enough power for the best performance.\n\nLow Distortion: Active crossovers minimize distortion compared to passive crossovers, especially at high power levels. This is because they work on the audio signal before it\u0026#39;s amplified, reducing the chance of signal quality issues.\n\nBi-Amping and Tri-Amping: Bi-amping and tri-amping are techniques made possible by active crossovers. These techniques involve using separate amplifiers for different frequency ranges, offering more precise control over each. For example, bi-amping uses two amplifiers (one for low frequencies and one for high frequencies), while tri-amping uses three (for low, mid, and high frequencies).\n\n \nExamples of active crossover devices include Digital Signal Processors (DSPs) like AudioControl D-Series amplifiers and DM-Series Processors. The D-6.1200 is one such example. AudioControl LC line amplifiers also have built-in active crossovers, offering a more affordable way to actively cross over amplifier outputs, similar to the D-Series.\n\nPassive Crossovers\nPassive crossovers use components like capacitors, inductors, and resistors to split the audio signal after it\u0026#39;s amplified. They don\u0026#39;t need external power but can introduce signal loss due to the components.\n \nUnlike active crossovers, passive ones are placed after the amplifier, which is why signal loss occurs. AudioControl PNW Series 6.5” and 6x9” Component Speaker Kits include the PNW-LF1 \u0026amp;amp; PNW-HF1, which have a single input and split the output into tweeter and woofer outputs.\n\n \nSome passive crossovers also have adjustable tweeter output levels for easier amplifier gain matching. It\u0026#39;s also important to note that passive crossovers have wattage limits. Exceeding these limits can damage the crossover or speakers.\nThe PNW-XN3 is a 3-way passive crossover network designed to expand an existing 2-way component speaker system into a full 3-way setup by adding a dedicated midrange driver to your midbass and tweeter combination. It is an ideal solution when active crossovers or a DSP are not available or simply do not fit the budget.\n\n \nActive vs. Passive Crossovers Summary: \n \n\n\n\n\nFeature\n\n\nActive Crossover\n\n\nPassive Crossover\n\n\n\n\nComponents\n\n\nAmplifier, crossover network\n\n\nCrossover network\n\n\n\n\nPlacement\n\n\nBefore the amplifier\n\n\nAfter the amplifier\n\n\n\n\nFrequency Adjustment\n\n\nMore precise control\n\n\nLess precise control\n\n\n\n\nPhase Alignment\n\n\nBetter control\n\n\nMore difficult to control\n\n\n\n\nCost\n\n\nGenerally more expensive\n\n\nGenerally less expensive\n\n\n\n\n \nTo conclude, crossovers are essential for ensuring each speaker in a car audio system receives the correct frequencies, leading to a balanced and accurate sound across the full range of audible frequencies. Active crossovers make sense for those looking for more precision and control in their audio. Passive crossovers provide less fine-tuning but are cheaper to integrate.",

Whether you’re showing off at the car meet or keeping things clean and stock, our new EPIC Pro speaker line is here to crank up your ride!
Because loud is just the beginning. EPIC Pro speakers are engineered to project sound far and wide with refined accuracy. Whether it’s a live set or a studio track, these speakers deliver big performance with serious efficiency.
While other drivers choose between a dust cap or phase plug, we combined both worlds with our innovative phase cap— widens bandwidth, increase efficiency and smooths frequency transitions between mid and high frequencies. Think of it like a superhero for your sound system.
With precision-tuned components, lightweight materials, and ground-up California design and engineering, these speakers are built to get loud without wasting precious power from your hard-working amplifier.
No matter your vibe, there’s an EPIC Pro speaker with your name on it. Turn it up. Be heard. Feel the performance.
### FEATURES
* **High Efficiency & Low Distortion:** Experience great, concert-level sound even at extreme volumes, free from distortion.
* **Huge Output & Far Projection:** Generate massive sound that fills your vehicle and projects powerfully, ensuring your audio is heard and felt.
* **Insane SPL (Sound Pressure Level) Capability:** Built to handle immense power, delivering exhilarating volume and dynamic impact without compromise.
* **Phase Cap for Efficiency & Bandwidth:** Innovative Phase Cap technology boosts efficiency and widens bandwidth, providing more sound from less power and capturing every musical nuance.
* **Lightweight Components & Precision Tolerances:** Meticulously engineered, lightweight components crafted with microscopic precision deliver superior efficiency, impactful sound, and incredibly accurate audio.
* **AudioControl Engineered:** Designed from the ground up by renowned AudioControl engineers, ensuring a holistic, performance-driven masterpiece born from unparalleled expertise.
* **Perfect Pair with EPIC Amplifiers:** Specifically voiced to integrate seamlessly with EPIC Series amplifiers, creating an optimized ecosystem for an unparalleled audio experience.
* **Set of 2 Speakers:**Includes 2 EPICPRO4T 4" Tweeters.
### SPECIFICATIONS
Speaker Model EPICPRO4T
Speaker Size 4.0 in / 102 mm
Impedance 4 ohms
Voice Coil 1.5 in / 38 mm
Frequency Response 2000 Hz – 20000 Hz
Sensitivity 108 dB @ 2.83V / 1M
Magnet Weight 8 oz
Power 80 W RMS / 120 W Max

				const topBarHeightRaw = getComputedStyle(document.documentElement).getPropertyValue('--top-bar-height');

				if (topBarHeightRaw.includes('rem')) {
					const remValue = parseFloat(topBarHeightRaw);

					topBarHeight = remValue * rootFontSize;

							$store.global.updateTopBarVisibility();
							$store.global.updateAnnouncementBarVisibilityCheck();

						this.ticking = false;

	<div x-data="
		{
			query: '',
			async init() {
				await this.fetchSearchResults();
			},
			closeSearch() {
				this.query = '';
				this.$store.global.search = false;
			},
			async fetchSearchResults(query = '') {
				try {
					const baseUrl = '/search?view=header-search';
					const url = query.trim() ? `${baseUrl}&q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}` : baseUrl;

					const response = await fetch(url);

					if (!response.ok) {
						throw new Error(`HTTP ${response.status}: ${response.statusText}`);
					}

					const html = await response.text();

					const parser = new DOMParser();
					const doc = parser.parseFromString(html, 'text/html');

					const searchResults = doc.querySelector('#searchResults');

					if (searchResults) {
						this.$refs.results.innerHTML = searchResults.outerHTML;
					} else {
						console.warn('No #searchResults element found in response');
					}
				} catch (error) {
					console.error('Search failed:', error);
				}
			},
			async search() {
				await this.fetchSearchResults(this.query);
			},
		}
	" class="contents" x-init="
		() => {
			$watch('$store.global.search', (value) => {
				if (value) {
					setTimeout(() => {
						$refs.searchInput.focus();
					}, 300);
				}
			});
		}
	">

					<p><meta charset="utf-8">Whether you’re showing off at the car meet or keeping things clean and stock, our new EPIC Pro speaker line is here to crank up your ride!</p>
<p>Because loud is just the beginning. EPIC Pro speakers are engineered to project sound far and wide with refined accuracy. Whether it’s a live set or a studio track, these speakers deliver big performance with serious efficiency.</p>
<p>While other drivers choose between a dust cap or phase plug, we combined both worlds with our innovative phase cap— widens bandwidth, increase efficiency and smooths frequency transitions between mid and high frequencies. Think of it like a superhero for your sound system.</p>
<p>With precision-tuned components, lightweight materials, and ground-up California design and engineering, these speakers are built to get loud without wasting precious power from your hard-working amplifier.</p>
<p>No matter your vibe, there’s an EPIC Pro speaker with your name on it. Turn it up. Be heard. Feel the performance.</p>
<h3>FEATURES</h3>
<ul>
<li>
<strong>High Efficiency & Low Distortion:</strong> Experience great, concert-level sound even at extreme volumes, free from distortion.</li>
<li>
<strong>Huge Output & Far Projection:</strong> Generate massive sound that fills your vehicle and projects powerfully, ensuring your audio is heard and felt.</li>
<li>
<strong>Insane SPL (Sound Pressure Level) Capability:</strong> Built to handle immense power, delivering exhilarating volume and dynamic impact without compromise.</li>
<li>
<strong>Phase Cap for Efficiency & Bandwidth:</strong> Innovative Phase Cap technology boosts efficiency and widens bandwidth, providing more sound from less power and capturing every musical nuance.</li>
<li>
<strong>Lightweight Components & Precision Tolerances:</strong> Meticulously engineered, lightweight components crafted with microscopic precision deliver superior efficiency, impactful sound, and incredibly accurate audio.</li>
<li>
<strong>AudioControl Engineered:</strong> Designed from the ground up by renowned AudioControl engineers, ensuring a holistic, performance-driven masterpiece born from unparalleled expertise.</li>
<li>
<strong>Perfect Pair with EPIC Amplifiers:</strong> Specifically voiced to integrate seamlessly with EPIC Series amplifiers, creating an optimized ecosystem for an unparalleled audio experience.</li>
<li>
<strong>Set of 2 Speakers: </strong>Includes 2 EPICPRO4T 4" Tweeters.</li>
</ul>
<p> </p>

						html.innerHTML = text;

						}
					})

<div class="scroll-mt-[var(--header-scroll-offset)]" id="specifications" x-init="
		() => {
			$nextTick(() => {
				cellSizer();
			});
		}
	" @resize.window.passive.throttle.100ms="
		() => {
			$nextTick(() => {
				cellSizer();
			});
		}
	" x-data="
		{
			cellSizer() {
				const rows = [...$root.querySelectorAll(`[data-row]`)];
				rows.forEach(row => {
					const cells = [...$root.querySelectorAll(`[data-cell='${row.dataset.row}']`), row];

					cells.forEach(cell => cell.style.height = 'auto');

					const max = [...cells, row].reduce((max, cell) => {
						return Math.max(max, cell.clientHeight);
					}, 0);

					cells.forEach(cell => cell.style.height = `${max}px`);
				});
			}
		}

<div x-show="show" aria-modal="true" aria-label="Cart Notification" style="display: none;" x-transition:enter-start="opacity-0 translate-y-[100px]" class="bg-grayscale-100/90 fixed inset-0 z-[200] flex justify-center px-[16px] pt-[64px] backdrop-blur-[7px] md:items-end" id="cart-notification" x-transition:leave-start="opacity-100 translate-y-0" x-data="{ show: false, scrolled: false, loading: false }" x-transition:enter-end="opacity-100 translate-y-0" x-transition:leave="transition-all duration-300" @product-added.window="
		async e => {
			await fetch(e.detail.url)
				.then(response => response.text())
				.then(html => {
					const parser = new DOMParser();
					const doc = parser.parseFromString(html, 'text/html');
					const content = doc.querySelector('#cart-notification');

					$root.innerHTML = content.innerHTML;
					show = true;
				})
		}
	" @click.self="show = false" x-trap.noscroll.inert.noautofocus="show" x-transition:enter="transition-all duration-300" role="dialog" @keydown.escape.window="show = false" x-transition:leave-end="opacity-0 translate-y-[100px]">
	<div @click.stop="" class="relative mx-auto mt-auto flex h-auto max-h-full flex-1 flex-col  max-w-[946px] " @cart-add.window="
			async e => {
				if (e.detail.data.upsell) {

					const id = e.detail.data.items[0].id;
					loading = id;

					const isMobile = window.innerWidth < 768;

					await fetch(e.detail.data.url)
						.then(response => response.text())
						.then(async html => {
							const parser = new DOMParser();
							const doc = parser.parseFromString(html, 'text/html');
							const newContent = doc.querySelector('#cart-notification [data-product]');


							const upsell = document.querySelector(`[data-upsell='${id}']`);
							const upsellParent = upsell.parentNode.parentNode;
							const upsellClone = upsell.cloneNode(true);
							const product = $refs.product.querySelector('[data-product]');
							const productClone = product.cloneNode(true);

							upsellParent.style.transition = 'height 0.3s ease-in-out';
							upsellParent.style.height = upsellParent.offsetHeight + 'px';

							upsellClone.style = `
								position: absolute;
								z-index: 200;
								top: ${upsellParent.offsetTop}px;
								left: ${upsellParent.offsetLeft}px;
								width: ${upsellParent.offsetWidth}px;
								transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
							`;

							productClone.style = `
								position: absolute;
								z-index: 200;
								top: ${product.offsetTop}px;
								left: ${product.offsetLeft}px;
								width: ${product.offsetWidth}px;
								transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
							`;

							$refs.upsells.appendChild(upsellClone);
							$refs.product.appendChild(productClone);

							upsellParent.style.opacity = 0;

							product.style.opacity = 0;
							product.style.transform = isMobile ? `translateY(50%)` : `translateX(50%)`;

							product.innerHTML = newContent.innerHTML;

							upsell.parentNode.addEventListener('transitionend', async (e) => {
								if (e.propertyName === 'height') {
									upsellParent.remove();
								}
							}, { once: true });

							upsellClone.addEventListener('transitionend', async () => {
								upsellParent.style.height = '0px';
								upsellClone.remove();
							}, { once: true });

							productClone.addEventListener('transitionend', async () => {
								productClone.remove();
							}, { once: true });

							product.addEventListener('transitionend', async () => {
								product.style.transition = 'none';
							}, { once: true });

							await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 10));

							loading = false;

							product.style.transition = 'all 0.3s ease-in-out';

							if (isMobile) $refs.container.scrollTo(0, 0);

							upsellClone.style.transform = isMobile ? `translateY(-50%)` : `translateX(-50%)`;
							upsellClone.style.opacity = 0;

							productClone.style.transform = isMobile ? `translateY(-50%)` : `translateX(-50%)`;
							productClone.style.opacity = 0;

							product.style.transform = isMobile ? `translateY(0%)` : `translateX(0%)`;
							product.style.opacity = 1;
						})
				}
			}
		">
		<button aria-label="Close" class="card flex-center absolute right-0 bottom-full mb-[16px] size-[32px] rounded-full text-white/60 transition hover:text-white lg:right-auto lg:left-full lg:mb-[-16px]" aria-controls="cart-notification" @click="show = false">

	" x-data="
		{
			scrollY: 0,
			scrolled: false,
			scrollThreshold: 0,
			ticking: false,

			activeDropdown: null,

			calculateScrollThreshold() {
				const topBarHeightRaw = getComputedStyle(document.documentElement).getPropertyValue('--top-bar-height');
				let topBarHeight;
				if (topBarHeightRaw.includes('rem')) {
					const remValue = parseFloat(topBarHeightRaw);
					const rootFontSize = parseFloat(getComputedStyle(document.documentElement).fontSize);
					topBarHeight = remValue * rootFontSize;
				} else {
					topBarHeight = parseFloat(topBarHeightRaw);
				}
				this.scrollThreshold = topBarHeight + ($store.global.announcementBarVisible && $store.global.announcementBarHeight > 0 ? $store.global.announcementBarHeight : 0);
			},

			handleScroll() {
				if (!this.ticking) {
					requestAnimationFrame(() => {
						this.scrollY = window.scrollY;
						const newScrolled = this.scrollY > this.scrollThreshold;
						if (newScrolled !== this.scrolled) {
							this.scrolled = newScrolled;
							$store.global.updateTopBarVisibility();
							$store.global.updateAnnouncementBarVisibilityCheck();
							$store.global.updateHeaderVariables(this.scrolled);
						}
						this.ticking = false;
					});
					this.ticking = true;
				}
			},

			handleResize() {
				this.calculateScrollThreshold();
				$store.global.updateAnnouncementBarVisibilityCheck();
				$store.global.updateHeaderVariables(this.scrolled);
			},

			setActiveDropdown(value) {
				this.activeDropdown = value;
			},
		}

		() => {

	" class="contents" x-data="
		{
			query: '',
			async init() {
				await this.fetchSearchResults();
			},
			closeSearch() {
				this.query = '';
				this.$store.global.search = false;
			},
			async fetchSearchResults(query = '') {
				try {
					const baseUrl = '/search?view=header-search';
					const url = query.trim() ? `${baseUrl}&q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}` : baseUrl;

					const response = await fetch(url);

					if (!response.ok) {
						throw new Error(`HTTP ${response.status}: ${response.statusText}`);
					}

					const html = await response.text();

					const parser = new DOMParser();
					const doc = parser.parseFromString(html, 'text/html');

					const searchResults = doc.querySelector('#searchResults');

					if (searchResults) {
						this.$refs.results.innerHTML = searchResults.outerHTML;
					} else {
						console.warn('No #searchResults element found in response');
					}
				} catch (error) {
					console.error('Search failed:', error);
				}
			},
			async search() {
				await this.fetchSearchResults(this.query);
			},
		}
	">

<div x-transition:leave-start="opacity-100 translate-y-0" aria-modal="true" x-transition:enter-start="opacity-0 translate-y-[100px]" id="cart-notification" @click.self="show = false" x-data="{ show: false, scrolled: false, loading: false }" class="bg-grayscale-100/90 fixed inset-0 z-[200] flex justify-center px-[16px] pt-[64px] backdrop-blur-[7px] md:items-end" x-transition:leave-end="opacity-0 translate-y-[100px]" x-transition:leave="transition-all duration-300" x-trap.noscroll.inert.noautofocus="show" x-show="show" x-transition:enter="transition-all duration-300" x-transition:enter-end="opacity-100 translate-y-0" role="dialog" style="display: none;" aria-label="Cart Notification" @keydown.escape.window="show = false" @product-added.window="
		async e => {
			await fetch(e.detail.url)
				.then(response => response.text())
				.then(html => {
					const parser = new DOMParser();
					const doc = parser.parseFromString(html, 'text/html');
					const content = doc.querySelector('#cart-notification');

					$root.innerHTML = content.innerHTML;
					show = true;
				})
		}
	">
	<div @cart-add.window="
			async e => {
				if (e.detail.data.upsell) {

					const id = e.detail.data.items[0].id;
					loading = id;

					const isMobile = window.innerWidth < 768;

					await fetch(e.detail.data.url)
						.then(response => response.text())
						.then(async html => {
							const parser = new DOMParser();
							const doc = parser.parseFromString(html, 'text/html');
							const newContent = doc.querySelector('#cart-notification [data-product]');


							const upsell = document.querySelector(`[data-upsell='${id}']`);
							const upsellParent = upsell.parentNode.parentNode;
							const upsellClone = upsell.cloneNode(true);
							const product = $refs.product.querySelector('[data-product]');
							const productClone = product.cloneNode(true);

							upsellParent.style.transition = 'height 0.3s ease-in-out';
							upsellParent.style.height = upsellParent.offsetHeight + 'px';

							upsellClone.style = `
								position: absolute;
								z-index: 200;
								top: ${upsellParent.offsetTop}px;
								left: ${upsellParent.offsetLeft}px;
								width: ${upsellParent.offsetWidth}px;
								transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
							`;

							productClone.style = `
								position: absolute;
								z-index: 200;
								top: ${product.offsetTop}px;
								left: ${product.offsetLeft}px;
								width: ${product.offsetWidth}px;
								transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
							`;

							$refs.upsells.appendChild(upsellClone);
							$refs.product.appendChild(productClone);

							upsellParent.style.opacity = 0;

							product.style.opacity = 0;
							product.style.transform = isMobile ? `translateY(50%)` : `translateX(50%)`;

							product.innerHTML = newContent.innerHTML;

							upsell.parentNode.addEventListener('transitionend', async (e) => {
								if (e.propertyName === 'height') {
									upsellParent.remove();
								}
							}, { once: true });

							upsellClone.addEventListener('transitionend', async () => {
								upsellParent.style.height = '0px';
								upsellClone.remove();
							}, { once: true });

							productClone.addEventListener('transitionend', async () => {
								productClone.remove();
							}, { once: true });

							product.addEventListener('transitionend', async () => {
								product.style.transition = 'none';
							}, { once: true });

							await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 10));

							loading = false;

							product.style.transition = 'all 0.3s ease-in-out';

							if (isMobile) $refs.container.scrollTo(0, 0);

							upsellClone.style.transform = isMobile ? `translateY(-50%)` : `translateX(-50%)`;
							upsellClone.style.opacity = 0;

							productClone.style.transform = isMobile ? `translateY(-50%)` : `translateX(-50%)`;
							productClone.style.opacity = 0;

							product.style.transform = isMobile ? `translateY(0%)` : `translateX(0%)`;
							product.style.opacity = 1;
						})
				}
			}
		" class="relative mx-auto mt-auto flex h-auto max-h-full flex-1 flex-col  md:max-w-[530px] " @click.stop="">
		<button aria-controls="cart-notification" class="card flex-center absolute right-0 bottom-full mb-[16px] size-[32px] rounded-full text-white/60 transition hover:text-white lg:right-auto lg:left-full lg:mb-[-16px]" aria-label="Close" @click="show = false">

						Continue Shopping

			</div>

			
		</div>

		<div x-transition:enter-start="opacity-0 translate-y-full" x-transition:enter-end="opacity-100 translate-y-0" x-data="{ show: false }" x-transition:leave-end="opacity-0 translate-y-full" x-show="show" x-transition:leave-start="opacity-100 translate-y-0" x-init="
				const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
					entries.forEach(entry => {
						show = !entry.isIntersecting;
					});
				});
				observer.observe(document.querySelector('#notification-checkout'));
			" class="from-grayscale-100/0 to-grayscale-100/50 fixed inset-x-[16px] bottom-0 z-[2] bg-gradient-to-b p-[16px] transition md:hidden">
			<a href="/checkout" class="btn btn--simple w-full" sca_handle_checkout=""> Checkout </a>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

		e => {
			show = true;
			error = e.detail?.error?.message;
			clearTimeout(timer);

			}, 3000);
		}
	" style="display: none;" x-show="show">
